title: Bon Jovi - Sessions From The Vault (Disc 8 & 9) - 320kbps
description:
DISC 8
1. Bon Jovi - Love Is War [Original Demo]
2. Bon Jovi - Let&#039;s Make It Baby [Original Talkbox Demo] 
3. Bon Jovi - Judgement Day [Studio Demo] 
4. Bon Jovi - River Of Love (Come Alive) [Studio Demo] 
5. Bon Jovi - Now And Forever [Studio Demo] 
6. Bon Jovi - Growing Up The Hard Way [Studio Demo] 
7. Bon Jovi - Does Anybody Really Fall In Love Anymore [Original Demo] 
8. Bon Jovi - Rosie [Original Demo] 

DISC 9
1. Bon Jovi - Homebound Train [Original Demo] 
2. Bon Jovi - Wild Is The Wind [Original Demo] 
3. Bon Jovi - Living In Sin [Original Demo] 
4. Bon Jovi - Blood On Blood [Original Demo] 
5. Bon Jovi - Backdoor To Heaven [Studio Demo] 
6. Bon Jovi - Love Hurts [Studio Demo] 
7. Bon Jovi - Stick To Your Guns [Original Demo] 
8. Bon Jovi - Love For Sale [Original Demo] 

-Back in 1988, Bon Jovi intended to release a double album as a follow up to the multi-platinum juggernaut "Slippery When Wet". The record company got nervous about the higher price point and decided they would only release a single album. Well, as this demo of the complete sequenced proposed double album shows, the record company was wrong. Great songs and great sound quality makes this a must have for all Bon Jovi Fans.
